Reference

Classes

Exported classes

show(<ExperimentList>) isEmpty(<ExperimentList>) dimnames(<ExperimentList>) mergeReplicates(<ExperimentList>) assay(<ANY>,<missing>) assays(<ExperimentList>) assay(<ExperimentList>,<missing>) assay(<ExperimentList>,<numeric>) assay(<ExperimentList>,<character>)

ExperimentList - A container for multi-experiment data The ExperimentList class is a container that builds on the SimpleList with additional checks for consistency in experiment names and length. It contains a SimpleList of experiments with sample identifiers. One element present per experiment performed. Convert from SimpleList or list to the multi-experiment data container. When using the mergeReplicates method, additional arguments are passed to the given simplify function argument (e.g., na.rm = TRUE)

Create a generalized Venn Diagram analog for sample membership in multiple assays, using the upset algorithm in UpSetR
